Row.Text: It is once again time for the Year Counting Ceremony: Igu Aro; whence all our loyal subjects pay tribute to our great spiritual guide and are unified in our benevolance. Let us rejoice and pass the yams![NEWLINE]
He who offers the greatest tribute shall have my blessing and some yams.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]The city other than the capital with the highest [ICON_PEACE] Faith output begins celebrating 'We Love the King Day' for {1_Num} turns[ENDCOLOR]
{1_CityName} has received our blessing for their great tribute to our unity.
The Year Counting Ceremony begins in the {1_CivName}.

Our reputation as an empire of unyielding peace and freedom has attracted a number of slaves from the City-State of {1_CityStateName} to come to our court seeking refuge. They ask that we free them of their servile bonds, and that we may let them live amongst our people.[NEWLINE]
No thanks. Our relationship with {1_CityStateName} is too important.
We have turned away runaway slaves from {1_CityStateName}, pleasing them immensely.
Their bonds are broken. Let no man own these people so long as they are of Nri.

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with {2_CityStateName}[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+1 [ICON_CITIZEN] Population in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital[ENDCOLOR]
We have accepted the runaway slaves from {1_CityStateName} into our empire.
Very well. But put them to work!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with {2_CityStateName}[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a free Worker Unit[ENDCOLOR]
We have accepted the runaway slaves from {1_CityStateName} into our empire and have put them straight to work.
